title: Is there a reason why leblancs ethereal chains range is 865 with a tether of 925?
body:
Meanwhile on a less mobile champion {{champion:240}} the chain is MUCH harder to land, 800 range, with a decreasing tether of 650?

I know they are completely different champions, but why is leblancs E just allowed to be as overpowered as it is when she has a double dash that can go over walls that she can also port back to?

Also please dont bother mentioning that you can dodge it. if the leblanc is good she w's directly on top of you and it is 100% guaranteed to land.

EDIT: forgot a word {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: Classic misdirection
you're basically saying kled's dick gets smaller as he goes further into the... thing...?
So it's impossible to actually break the tether when thinking about the absolute horrible link detection code.  You can flash it, but still get rooted if you flash in the last .25 seconds.
Yep.  IF she hits you she is the only one who will break it.  You have no choice.
depends on the mobillity of your champ...
It really needs to check the range more often.  The number of times you're out of range but it fails to register is super frustrating.

Yeah. LB's tether range is insanely fucking huge.

I should be able to flash out of it if she W>E>Ws, or it hits at mid-range. Yet you can't even do that.

Why should you be able to flash out of it?
Why can't you flash or dodge the initial skillshot?
It's almost like she can WR on top of me from 3 walls over and make her E impossible to dodge.
So she just used her 2 good damage spells to help her aim chain?
She used three of her damaging abilities to deal damage to you with two of them, while the first set up the other two. Looks pretty normal to me.
Her two good damage spells, as if her chain and Q aren't good damage spells? Not to mention she can hit you with the RW in that combo.
Im pretty sure leblancs tether range is so long so she's able to go back to her w without the tether getting destroyed instantly

which doesn't make it fine.
The whole reason she has that tether mechanic is so she has to trade damage+CC for the savety of an instand W-recast. If She can get both without much tradeoff, it gets problematic.

I think LB would feel alot fairer to face if her tether range would go down to ~650 over the duration, similar to kled. That way she really has to commit for full value.

It actually is. Tether range is 325 units longer than her W's range. 600 versus 925.

The only way to break it from melee range is for LB to W and either flash or ult after that.

Riot likes how Bullshit Lebs chain is. Back before the revert, people said that the thing that needs to be nerfed about her was her chain, only for Riot to repeatedly nerf literally everything else about her.
I can only imagine it is because its the only real linear skillshot in her kit.

Yeah the tether should just be +200 range from where she cast it from.

This would buff long range chain hits and nerf W -> E.

? Why is that? She still has to maintain the tether for the snare. This is a massive nerf to point blank W -> E cuz it changes it from 925 range to 200-300 range.

Based on your other comment, I think you are just confused as to how her tether works. Mind explaining what you think it does?
Nothing changes the snare time. It's a static 1.5 seconds. Dunno where you got that from.

No champion has a dash capable of breaking a 925 range tether.

Flash isn't long enough to break it either.

Literally the only way out is using an unstoppable ultimate like Sion or Malphite.

Edit: nvm, i guess I was seeing things when zed kept instantly swapping shadows that game weeks ago.

The range on her tether is such a small part of her kit and the snare doesn't even last long.
Kled's q goes through minions, LB's doesn't. LB doesn't have AAs to damage the champ after her snare lands, while Kled is an AD champs with an AS steroid. Consider teamfights, LB isn't meant to stay inside the fight, so she moves around the edges.
Since when did Kled's Q snare people?
True, Kled's displaces (then slows) them which is a much stronger form of CC.

Everything is relative mate.

40%-60% slow for 1.75 seconds plus a minor pull versus 1.5 seconds root. Personally I'd go with the root any day.

And let's not forget LB can choose to send out 2 of these roots if she so desires.

I honestly hate LeBlanc's kit for the most part, except for the W and R. The Q and E feel like total filler to me, and I just despise how clunky her chains look and operate. Plus, they don't really feel very "mistress of illusions" to me.

Her chain gives a pretty big illusion to her opponent tho: one that if they get far enough they might be able to break the chain. Which never happens in practice due to insanely long tether range and LB's own mobility... but hey, the break range is just over there. You can do it with 2 or 3 dashes + Flash if LB forgets about W button on her keyboard.
Because Riot has a boner for her
LB is ranged and expected to stay at a range much further away than Kled.

The tether range is still massive even considering her being ranged, and she often goes into melee range as well (Due to her W).

She can't physically break it with her own dash from melee range. **Her own dash isn't long enough to let her break her own tether**.

Kled's Q can also be escaped by flashing. Flash does jack shit versus LB's tether.
Because someone in the balance team likes her.

My guess is it being a way to force her to stay within a certain range of the enemy team if she wants to commit to that snare and late game 1.5 seconds (I believe thats the time is a long time for a squishy champ

Kled & Fiddlestick's tethers got nothing on Leblanc's Tether.
Once she tags you with it, you get CC'd & there's no point in flashing or using any mobility spells.
